title: Audit a Company Reorganization
description: Following a major corporate reorganization, an auditor reviews the project to see if it achieved its goals.

tasks.description: Review the business case for the reorganization to identify the stated goals, such as 'reduce operating costs by 15%'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor understands the intended outcomes of the project.

tasks.description: Analyze the financial data from before and after the reorganization.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that operating costs were only reduced by 5%, falling short of the goal.

tasks.description: Interview senior leaders to understand the reasons for the shortfall and document lessons learned for future strategic projects.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit provides insights into why the project underdelivered on its financial goals.
